name: com.kadronk.spriteanimation
description:
Animation package for frame-by-frame sprite animation.
Based on Unity's "Animation -> Animator Controller -> Animator" pipeline, but without the superfluous stuff that is often only used for 3d animation.

To create animation assets, Right click in the Project window > 2D > "Frame-by-frame Animation" (equivalent to Unity's Animations) and "Frame-by-frame Animation Collection" (equivalent to Unity's Animation Controllers).
To animate a Sprite Renderer, add a "Sprite Animator" on the GameObject, and add the drag'n'drop in an Animation Collection.
To animate an UI Image, same thing with an "Image Animator".
